body_html:
@caisq It looks like this PR adds one or more new Python modules. The file tf_python.cmake has a sequence of add_python_module(…) commands, one per module, and I guess we'll need a new one:

add_python_module("tensorflow/python/layers")

…and maybe others if there are submodules within that directory.
body:
@caisq It looks like this PR adds one or more new Python modules. The file [tf_python.cmake](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_python.cmake) has a sequence of `add_python_module(…)` commands, one per module, and I guess we'll need a new one:

```
add_python_module("tensorflow/python/layers")
```

…and maybe others if there are submodules within that directory.
